result.execSummary:
The defendant Michael Anthony Brisby was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse Assessments], a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Michael Anthony Brisby in court with attorney John Mathew Krejci.  Peter A. Hahn appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Deputy Court Clerk: rmm.  
Court found the state has satisfied victims' rights law.  Sentencing proceeded.  Statements by the State, defense and defendant.  The Court ordered the Defendant to serve 60 days in the House of Correction, consecutive to any other sentence with credit for 60 days time served.  THIS IS A TIME SERVED DISPOSITION.  Court ordered defendant to pay all applicable court costs and surcharges by 11/07/16. Court found the domestic abuse enhancer is applicable.  DNA sample; pay the surcharge.   Any amount remaining due and owing is subject to civil judgment and/or tax intercept or other means.

Defendant Michael Anthony Brisby in court with attorney John Mathew Krejci.  Defendant Michael Anthony Brisby in custody.  Jaclyn Schwartz appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Deputy court clerk: LMS.

CASE HEARD BY BRANCH 6 FOR BRANCH 40.
Defendant was advised of constitutional rights and maximum penalties, waived all rights, plead GUILTY and was examined as to the plea.  Plea Questionnaire/Waiver of Rights and Addendum received and filed.  Parties stipulate to the complaint as a factual basis for the plea.  Defendant further advised that if he is not a US citizen deportation is possible.  Court found defendant guilty as charged in the Information and ordered entry of Judgment of Conviction.  Sentencing hearing scheduled for November 5, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Attorney John Mathew Krejci in court, defendant Michael Anthony Brisby not in court, in custody.  Benjamin Calvin Verhulst appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Deputy Court Clerk: rmm.  
Final pretrial held off record.  Case remains set for jury trial on 11/02/15.
Defendant enters a SPEEDY TRIAL DEMAND.

Attorney John Mathew Krejci in court, defendant Michael Anthony Brisby not in court, in custody.  Sarah McNutt appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Deputy Court Clerk: rmm.  
Bail hearing waived.  Pretrial Conference held.  Case is adjourned to Branch 40.  Final pre-trial scheduled for October 7, 2015 at 08:30 am.  Jury trial scheduled for November 2, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Attorney John Mathew Krejci in court, defendant Michael Anthony Brisby not in court, in custody.  Sarah McNutt appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Deputy Court Clerk: rmm.
Bail hearing waived.  State does not have their file.  Counsel was just given this case and knows nothing about it.  Case is adjourned to Branch 40.  Bail/bond hearing scheduled for September 17, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Michael Anthony Brisby in court with attorney Daniel Gordon Mitchell.  Defendant Michael Anthony Brisby in custody.  
Benjamin Calvin Verhulst appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   

Defendant is advised  case is assigned to Judge Dallet, Branch 40.  Bail/bond hearing scheduled for September 16, 2015 at 08:30 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Michael Anthony Brisby
Current: 3309 N 12th Street, Milwaukee, WI 53206   (Effective: 09-12-2015)
Prior: 3022 North 21st Street, Milwaukee, WI 53206
Defendant's Bail Forfeiture Notice returned undeliverable.
Notice of bond forfeiture mailed to defendant; Original in file. ($500.00 signature bond) ad
Non-Appearance entry of 6/3/2015 reflects corrected information.

Defendant Michael Anthony Brisby NOT in court, Attorney Daniel E Meylink, previously in court.  Sarra Kiaie appeared for the State of Wisconsin. 
BRANCH 23 FOR BRANCH 40
Case set for Pretrial Conference.  Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered a Bench Warrant to be issued forthwith. COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE COMMISSIONER ON RETURN OF THE BENCH WARRANT. Court ordered any bail on deposit to be forfeited, but held pending restitution and recompense.

No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.
  Defendant advised if released from custody it is a requirement to attend all future court proceedings.
Failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping, a warrant issued or high cash bail.

Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with FREDINA H.
  Court advised defendant that failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.

Defendant Michael Anthony Brisby in court with attorney Colin P. McGinn.  Carole Manchester appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk:  hgj.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Dallet, Branch 40.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for June 3, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
